body:
Unless you uncheck "Remove unusual target choices", Aether Vial ticks up automatically. In contrast, Legacy's Allure asks for confirmation regardless of preference settings.

This seems backwards. Ticking up Legacy's Allure is a strict upgrade, while ticking up Aether Vial is most definitely not.
author: [manve.he...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/107839499302741838633/)
title: "Unusualness" of certain effects is off.
